subject: I am Deborah Berg Secretary of
body:
I am Deborah Berg Secretary of US Department of Homeland Security
 (ATM Card/ DEBIT Card Number 5061050258799644527)Your Personal
Identification Number is 3851. The Card Value is ($5.5M USD has been
pended here for a long time
and it is not the best way, because the ATM CARD has it validity date
to be on delivery and once the validity date of delivery is expires
the issued ATM CARD will be terminated as the bank here will take it
that you the beneficiary is not serious to adhere to the directives to
have the ATM CARD be delivered to your address.
It is the courier company that demanded the fee of 155$ and am not
working with the courier company, so the fee will not been given to me
or they Bank but to the courier company,i wanted you to send the money
to ensure your issued ATM CARD get to you doorstep with guarantee safety
delivery.
Waiting your positive response regard getting safety delivery to your door step
and 
you should try to re-confirm your contact address to avoid any
wrongful delivery
of the ATM CARD, Thanks
Regards,
From The Desk Of:
Deborah  Berg
SECRETARY US (DHS)

subject: Re: I am Deborah Berg Secretary of
body:
Dear Deborah Berg,

Thank you for your email. I understand that there is an ATM card with a significant value pending for me. However, I am a bit confused about the details of this transaction.

Could you please provide more information about the following:

1. What is the exact amount on the ATM card?
2. What is the validity date of this card?
3. How much is the courier fee and how should it be paid?

Also, could you please confirm my contact address as follows:



I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Laura
